quiz.question: yank ____
quiz.explanation: 猛拉,猛拉绳索。He had to yank cord several times to start the lawnmower.他不得不猛拉绳索几次才能启动割草机。

quiz.question: ____ dink
quiz.explanation: 轻击球,轻击球。The tennis player used a clever dink shot over the net.网球运动员使用了一个巧妙的轻击球越过网。

quiz.question: clink _______
quiz.explanation: 碰杯,碰杯。The guests would clink glasses in a toast to the bride.客人们会碰杯向新娘敬酒。

quiz.question: slink ____
quiz.explanation: 悄悄溜走,悄悄溜走。The guilty dog would slink away after being caught misbehaving.被抓到行为不端后,内疚的狗会悄悄溜走。

quiz.question: ___ stink
quiz.explanation: 臭味,难闻的臭味。A bad stink came from the garbage left in the summer heat.夏季高温下留下的垃圾发出难闻的臭味。

quiz.question: hoodwink ______
quiz.explanation: 欺骗,欺骗人们。The con artist would hoodwink people with elaborate schemes.骗子会用精心设计的诡计欺骗人们。

quiz.question: dunk ____
quiz.explanation: 扣篮,扣篮球。The basketball player would dunk ball with impressive power.篮球运动员会用惊人的力量扣篮球。

quiz.question: ____ thunk
quiz.explanation: 砰的一声,大声的砰的一声。A loud thunk echoed when the book fell to the floor.书掉到地板上时回响起大声的砰的一声。

quiz.question: ______ clunk
quiz.explanation: 咔嗒声,引擎咔嗒声。The engine clunk indicated something was seriously wrong.引擎咔嗒声表明有严重问题。

quiz.question: plunk ____ _____
quiz.explanation: 重重放下,重重放下钱。He would plunk down money on the counter impatiently.他会不耐烦地把钱重重放在柜台上。

quiz.question: ___ amok
quiz.explanation: 胡作非为,胡作非为。The escaped animals would run amok through the city streets.逃跑的动物会在城市街道上胡作非为。

quiz.question: __ tenterhooks
quiz.explanation: 焦虑不安,焦虑不安。The team was on tenterhooks waiting for the competition results.团队焦虑不安地等待比赛结果。

quiz.question: _____ nook
quiz.explanation: 角落,安静的角落。She found a quiet nook in the library to read undisturbed.她在图书馆找到一个安静的角落不受打扰地阅读。

quiz.question: _____ crook
quiz.explanation: 弯曲,鼻子弯曲。The boxer had a distinctive crook nose from years of fighting.拳击手因多年战斗而有独特的鼻子弯曲。

quiz.question: embark __ _______
quiz.explanation: 开始,开始旅程。The explorers prepared to embark on journey to the North Pole.探险家准备开始前往北极的旅程。

quiz.question: disembark __________
quiz.explanation: 下船,让乘客下船。The crew would disembark passengers after the ship docked.船只停靠后,船员会让乘客下船。

quiz.question: lark _____
quiz.explanation: 嬉戏,嬉戏。The children would lark about in the playground during recess.孩子们在课间休息时会在操场上嬉戏。

quiz.question: ____ pockmark
quiz.explanation: 痘疤,脸上的痘疤。The disease left permanent face pockmarks on his skin.疾病在他的皮肤上留下了永久的脸上痘疤。

quiz.question: _____ berk
quiz.explanation: 笨蛋,愚蠢的笨蛋。Don't be such a silly berk and think before you speak.不要做这样愚蠢的笨蛋,说话前要三思。

quiz.question: __ berserk
quiz.explanation: 发狂,发狂。The crowd would go berserk when the rock star appeared.摇滚明星出现时,人群会发狂。

quiz.question: irk _______
quiz.explanation: 使烦恼,使某人烦恼。His constant complaining would irk someone tremendously.他不断的抱怨会极大地使某人烦恼。

quiz.question: _____ smirk
quiz.explanation: 得意的笑,得意的笑脸。He had an annoying smirk face after winning the argument.赢得争论后,他有一张讨厌的得意笑脸。

quiz.question: patchwork _____
quiz.explanation: 拼布,拼布被子。The grandmother made a beautiful patchwork quilt from old fabrics.祖母用旧布料制作了一床漂亮的拼布被子。

quiz.question: ____ handiwork
quiz.explanation: 手工,精美的手工。The carpenter's fine handiwork was evident in every detail.木匠精美的手工在每个细节中都很明显。

quiz.question: wickerwork _____
quiz.explanation: 柳条制品,柳条制品椅子。The garden featured comfortable wickerwork chairs for relaxing.花园里有舒适的柳条制品椅子供放松使用。

quiz.question: ____ guesswork
quiz.explanation: 猜测,盲目的猜测。Without data, their predictions were just wild guesswork.没有数据,他们的预测只是盲目的猜测。

quiz.question: lurk __ ____
quiz.explanation: 潜伏,在黑暗中潜伏。Dangerous criminals would lurk in dark alleys at night.危险的罪犯会在夜晚的黑暗小巷中潜伏。

quiz.question: bask __ ___
quiz.explanation: 晒太阳,晒太阳。The cat loved to bask in sun on the warm windowsill.猫喜欢在温暖的窗台上晒太阳。

quiz.question: ____ flask
quiz.explanation: 瓶子,酒瓶子。The traveler carried a wine flask for the long journey.旅行者为长途旅行携带了一个酒瓶子。

quiz.question: hipflask ______
quiz.explanation: 扁酒瓶,口袋扁酒瓶。He kept a small hipflask pocket hidden in his jacket.他在夹克里藏了一个小口袋扁酒瓶。

quiz.question: whisk ____
quiz.explanation: 搅拌,搅拌鸡蛋。The chef would whisk eggs vigorously for the omelet.厨师会用力搅拌鸡蛋做煎蛋卷。

quiz.question: ________ basilisk
quiz.explanation: 蛇怪,神话中的蛇怪。The mythical basilisk could kill with its deadly gaze.神话中的蛇怪可以用致命的凝视杀死人。

quiz.question: _____ brisk
quiz.explanation: 轻快的,轻快的步行。A brisk walk every morning helped maintain her fitness.每天早上轻快的步行帮助她保持健康。

quiz.question: frisk _______
quiz.explanation: 搜身,搜查嫌疑人。Police would frisk suspect for weapons or contraband.警察会搜查嫌疑人是否有武器或违禁品。

quiz.question: gawk __
quiz.explanation: 呆呆地看,呆呆地看。Tourists would gawk at the famous landmarks with amazement.游客会惊讶地呆呆地看着著名的地标。

quiz.question: ____ squawk
quiz.explanation: 尖叫,鸟的尖叫。The loud bird squawk woke everyone in the neighborhood.响亮的鸟的尖叫吵醒了社区里的每个人。

quiz.question: ________ comical
quiz.explanation: 滑稽的,滑稽的场景。The comical scene in the movie made everyone laugh.电影中滑稽的场景让每个人都笑了。

quiz.question: pyrotechnical _______
quiz.explanation: 烟火的,烟火表演。The New Year's pyrotechnical display lit up the night sky.新年烟火表演照亮了夜空。

quiz.question: cylindrical _____
quiz.explanation: 圆柱形的,圆柱形状。The vase had a simple cylindrical shape with smooth sides.花瓶有简单的圆柱形状,侧面光滑。

quiz.question: hysterical ________
quiz.explanation: 歇斯底里的,歇斯底里的笑声。Hysterical laughter erupted from the comedy club audience.喜剧俱乐部观众爆发出歇斯底里的笑声。

quiz.question: fanatical _________
quiz.explanation: 狂热的,狂热的支持者。The fanatical supporter painted his face in team colors.狂热的支持者把脸涂成球队颜色。

quiz.question: quizzical ____
quiz.explanation: 疑惑的,疑惑的眼神。She gave him a quizzical look when he made the strange claim.当他提出奇怪的说法时,她给了他疑惑的眼神。

quiz.question: ________ vandal
quiz.explanation: 破坏者,无脑的破坏者。The mindless vandal spray-painted graffiti on historic buildings.无脑的破坏者在历史建筑上喷涂涂鸦。

quiz.question: _______ ordeal
quiz.explanation: 严峻考验,痛苦的严峻考验。The hostages endured a painful ordeal during their captivity.人质在被囚禁期间经受了痛苦的严峻考验。

quiz.question: _____ congeal
quiz.explanation: 凝结,血液凝结。The cold temperature caused blood to congeal on the surface.低温导致血液在表面凝结。

quiz.question: ____ peal __ _____
quiz.explanation: 响亮的声音,响亮的钟声。A loud peal of bells announced the wedding ceremony.响亮的钟声宣告了婚礼仪式。

quiz.question: _________ corporeal
quiz.explanation: 肉体的,肉体的身体。The ghost lacked a corporeal body and could pass through walls.鬼魂缺乏肉体的身体,可以穿墙而过。

quiz.question: ___ squeal
quiz.explanation: 尖叫,猪的尖叫。The loud pig squeal could be heard across the farm.响亮的猪的尖叫在整个农场都能听到。

quiz.question: ______ weal
quiz.explanation: 福祉,公共福祉。The politician claimed to work for the common weal of all citizens.政治家声称为所有公民的公共福祉工作。

quiz.question: _____ sundial
quiz.explanation: 日晷,石制日晷。The ancient stone sundial marked time by the sun's shadow.古老的石制日晷通过太阳的影子标记时间。

quiz.question: _____ phial
quiz.explanation: 小瓶,玻璃小瓶。The wizard kept potions in delicate glass phials on the shelf.巫师把药水放在架子上精致的玻璃小瓶里。

quiz.question: pestilential _______
quiz.explanation: 瘟疫的,瘟疫的疾病。The pestilential disease spread rapidly through the population.瘟疫的疾病在人群中迅速传播。

quiz.question: torrential ____
quiz.explanation: 倾盆的,倾盆大雨。Torrential rain flooded the streets within hours.倾盆大雨在几小时内淹没了街道。

quiz.question: ________ vial
quiz.explanation: 小瓶,药品小瓶。The doctor prepared a medicine vial for the injection.医生为注射准备了一个药品小瓶。

quiz.question: ______ jovial
quiz.explanation: 快活的,快活的心情。Santa Claus was always depicted in a jovial mood.圣诞老人总是被描绘成快活的心情。

quiz.question: ______ jackal
quiz.explanation: 豺狼,沙漠豺狼。The desert jackal hunted at night in the harsh environment.沙漠豺狼在恶劣的环境中夜间捕猎。

quiz.question: infinitesimal ______
quiz.explanation: 极小的,极小的数量。An infinitesimal amount of the substance was needed for testing.测试只需要极小的数量的物质。

quiz.question: subnormal _____
quiz.explanation: 低于正常的,低于正常的孩子。The outdated term described a subnormal child with learning difficulties.过时的术语描述了有学习困难的低于正常的孩子。

quiz.question: ______ dismal
quiz.explanation: 阴沉的,阴沉的天气。The dismal weather dampened everyone's spirits at the picnic.阴沉的天气使野餐时每个人的情绪低落。

quiz.question: abysmal _______
quiz.explanation: 糟糕的,糟糕的失败。The product launch was an abysmal failure that lost millions.产品发布是糟糕的失败,损失了数百万。

quiz.question: phenomenal _______
quiz.explanation: 非凡的,非凡的成功。The movie was a phenomenal success breaking all box office records.这部电影是非凡的成功,打破了所有票房记录。

quiz.question: delusional ______
quiz.explanation: 妄想的,妄想的信念。The patient suffered from delusional beliefs about persecution.病人患有关于迫害的妄想信念。

quiz.question: sensational ____
quiz.explanation: 耸人听闻的,耸人听闻的新闻。The tabloid published sensational news to boost circulation.小报发布耸人听闻的新闻以提高发行量。

quiz.question: impersonal ____
quiz.explanation: 冷淡的,冷淡的语调。The email had an impersonal tone that seemed unfriendly.电子邮件有冷淡的语调,看起来不友好。

quiz.question: ________ infernal
quiz.explanation: 恼人的,恼人的噪音。The infernal noise from construction kept her awake all night.建筑工地恼人的噪音让她整夜无法入睡。

quiz.question: ________ paternal
quiz.explanation: 父爱的,父爱。The man showed deep paternal love toward his adopted children.这个男人对他收养的孩子表现出深深的父爱。

quiz.question: _____ foal
quiz.explanation: 小马,马小马。The mare gave birth to a healthy horse foal in spring.母马在春天生下了一匹健康的马小马。

quiz.question: appal ________
quiz.explanation: 使惊骇,使观众惊骇。The violent scenes would appal audience members unprepared for them.暴力场景会使没有准备的观众惊骇。

quiz.question: sepulchral _____
quiz.explanation: 阴森的,阴森的声音。The ghost spoke in a deep sepulchral voice that echoed eerily.鬼魂用低沉阴森的声音说话,回声诡异。

quiz.question: enthral _______
quiz.explanation: 迷住,迷住读者。The novelist's writing would enthral readers for generations.小说家的写作会迷住几代读者。

quiz.question: _______ perusal
quiz.explanation: 细读,仔细细读。The lawyer gave the contract a careful perusal before signing.律师在签字前对合同进行了仔细细读。

quiz.question: _____ recital
quiz.explanation: 独奏会,钢琴独奏会。The student performed beautifully at her piano recital.学生在她的钢琴独奏会上表演得很好。

quiz.question: temperamental ______
quiz.explanation: 喜怒无常的,喜怒无常的艺术家。The temperamental artist refused to work under pressure.喜怒无常的艺术家拒绝在压力下工作。

quiz.question: noncommittal ______
quiz.explanation: 含糊的,含糊的回答。The politician gave a noncommittal answer to the controversial question.政治家对有争议的问题给出了含糊的回答。

quiz.question: asphodel ______
quiz.explanation: 水仙花,水仙花。The ancient Greeks believed asphodel flowers grew in the underworld.古希腊人相信水仙花在冥界生长。

quiz.question: cartwheel ____
quiz.explanation: 侧手翻,侧手翻动作。The gymnast executed a perfect cartwheel move across the mat.体操运动员在垫子上完成了完美的侧手翻动作。

quiz.question: ____ keel
quiz.explanation: 龙骨,船龙骨。The ship keel was damaged when it ran aground on rocks.当船在岩石上搁浅时,船龙骨受损。

quiz.question: kneel ____
quiz.explanation: 跪下,跪下。The knight would kneel down before the king in respect.骑士会在国王面前恭敬地跪下。

quiz.question: pummel ________
quiz.explanation: 连续猛击,连续猛击对手。The boxer would pummel opponent with rapid punches.拳击手会用快速拳击连续猛击对手。

quiz.question: ______ flannel
quiz.explanation: 法兰绒,棉法兰绒。The soft cotton flannel shirt kept him warm in winter.柔软的棉法兰绒衬衫在冬天让他保持温暖。

quiz.question: repel ______
quiz.explanation: 击退,击退攻击。The defenders managed to repel attack after hours of fighting.防御者在战斗数小时后设法击退攻击。

quiz.question: _____ scalpel
quiz.explanation: 手术刀,锋利的手术刀。The surgeon used a sharp scalpel for the delicate operation.外科医生用锋利的手术刀进行精细手术。

quiz.question: propel _______
quiz.explanation: 推进,向前推进。The rocket engines would propel forward the spacecraft into orbit.火箭发动机会向前推进航天器进入轨道。

quiz.question: dispel ______
quiz.explanation: 消除,消除疑虑。The clear evidence helped dispel doubts about his innocence.明确的证据帮助消除了对他清白的疑虑。

quiz.question: _______ mongrel
quiz.explanation: 杂种,杂种狗。The friendly mongrel dog was a mix of several breeds.友好的杂种狗是几个品种的混合。

quiz.question: ____ wastrel
quiz.explanation: 浪荡子,懒惰的浪荡子。The family disowned the lazy wastrel who squandered the fortune.家族与挥霍财产的懒惰浪荡子断绝关系。

quiz.question: ______ weasel
quiz.explanation: 黄鼠狼,狡猾的黄鼠狼。The sneaky weasel stole eggs from the chicken coop.狡猾的黄鼠狼从鸡舍偷鸡蛋。

quiz.question: _____ chisel
quiz.explanation: 凿子,石凿。The sculptor used a stone chisel to carve the marble statue.雕塑家用石凿雕刻大理石雕像。

quiz.question: _________ tinsel
quiz.explanation: 金属丝,圣诞金属丝。The tree was decorated with shiny Christmas tinsel and ornaments.树上装饰着闪亮的圣诞金属丝和装饰品。

quiz.question: ____ morsel
quiz.explanation: 一口,微小的一口。He saved a tiny morsel of cake for later.他留了微小的一口蛋糕以后吃。

quiz.question: ______________ carousel
quiz.explanation: 旋转木马,旋转木马。Children rode the colorful merry-go-round carousel at the fair.孩子们在集市上骑五颜六色的旋转木马。

quiz.question: ____ lintel
quiz.explanation: 门楣,门门楣。The ancient door lintel was carved with intricate patterns.古老的门门楣雕刻着复杂的图案。

quiz.question: ___________ navel
quiz.explanation: 肚脐,肚脐。The belly button navel is a scar from the umbilical cord.肚脐是脐带留下的疤痕。

quiz.question: unravel _______
quiz.explanation: 解开,解开谜团。The detective worked to unravel mystery of the missing jewels.侦探努力解开失踪珠宝的谜团。

quiz.question: dishevel ____
quiz.explanation: 弄乱,弄乱的头发。The strong wind would dishevel hair into a tangled mess.强风会把头发弄乱成一团乱麻。

quiz.question: multilevel ________
quiz.explanation: 多层的,多层建筑。The multilevel building housed offices on several floors.多层建筑在几个楼层设有办公室。

quiz.question: ______ snivel
quiz.explanation: 抽鼻子,抽鼻子的孩子。The crying snivel child needed comfort from his mother.哭泣抽鼻子的孩子需要母亲的安慰。

quiz.question: shrivel __
quiz.explanation: 枯萎,枯萎。The plants would shrivel up without water in the heat.植物在高温下没有水会枯萎。

quiz.question: _____ hovel
quiz.explanation: 陋屋,肮脏的陋屋。The poor family lived in a dirty hovel with no electricity.贫穷的家庭住在没有电的肮脏陋屋里。

quiz.question: shovel ____
quiz.explanation: 铲,铲雪。After the blizzard, neighbors helped shovel snow from driveways.暴风雪后,邻居们帮忙从车道上铲雪。
